title: What was i banned for?
body:
I haven't played any games for the past 2 days and I came on and I was banned?

I have a suspicion that I might have been hacked and someone got my account banned.

This is my favourite account and I have worked hard on it ;(

Please fix this
 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
:o  If your account was hacked, we definitely want to get it resolved and get it back to you asap!  Unfortunately this isn't something we can really help out with here on Boards.  Your best bet to to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) if you haven't already.  One of our ticket agents should be able to investigate to figure out what is going on.

I hope that helps!
I still haven't received a reply in my ticket, How long would it usually take to receive a reply?

Before I wrote to the boards, I already sent a ticket but when I checks "My Tickets" there isn't any. I'll send another one just incase

Thanks!
